Package finalproject.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object

java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
finalproject.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Server
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable
Server UI , uses SQLite Driver for JDBC and JAVA FX Swing AWT
Author:
Milind Singh
